<DESCRIPTION>AMENDMENTS TO THE PEPSICO EXECUTIVE INCOME DEFERRAL PROGRAM
<TEXT>
<HTML><HEAD>
<TITLE>Amendments to the PepsiCo Executive Income Deferral Program</TITLE>
</HEAD>
 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Exhibit 10.34 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Amendments to the PepsiCo Executive Income Deferral Program </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>(effective December&nbsp;30, 2006)
</B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="justify"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">1.</FONT></P></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">Section&nbsp;5.02(b)(2) of the PepsiCo Executive Income Deferral Program, effective January&nbsp;1, 2005 (referred to as the &#147;409A Program&#148;) is hereby
amended by replacing the current text in its entirety with the following: </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:10%" ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><U>Phantom AFR Fund</U>:
Participant Accounts invested in this phantom option accrue a return based upon an interest rate that is 120% of the applicable Federal long-term rate (pursuant to Code Section&nbsp;1274(d) or any successor provision) applicable for annual
compounding, as published by the U.S. Internal Revenue Service from time to time. Returns accrue for each month based upon 120% of the applicable Federal long-term rate (applicable for annual compounding) in effect on the first business day of each
month and are compounded annually. An amount deferred or transferred into this option is credited with the applicable rate of return beginning with the date as of which the amount is treated as invested in this option by the Plan Administrator.
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="justify"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">2.</FONT></P></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">The occurrence of &#147;Phantom Prime Rate Fund&#148; in Section&nbsp;5.03 of the 409A Program is hereby replaced with &#147;Phantom AFR Fund.&#148;
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="justify"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">3.</FONT></P></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">Section&nbsp;4.1(c)(1) of the PepsiCo Executive Income Deferral Program, as amended and restated effective July&nbsp;1, 1997 (referred to as the &#147;Pre-409A
Program&#148;) is hereby amended by replacing the current text in its entirety with the following: </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:10%" ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="3"><U>Interest Bearing Account</U>: Participant Accounts invested in this phantom option accrue a return based upon an interest rate that is 120% of the applicable Federal long-term rate (pursuant to Code Section&nbsp;1274(d) or any successor
provision) applicable for annual compounding, as published by the U.S. Internal Revenue Service from time to time. Returns accrue during the period since the last Valuation Date based upon 120% of the applicable Federal long-term rate (applicable
for annual compounding) in effect on the first business day after such Valuation Date and are compounded annually. An amount deferred or transferred into this option is credited with the applicable rate of return beginning with the date as of which
the amount is treated as invested in this option by the Plan Administrator. </FONT></P>

</TEXT>

<TYPE>EX-10.41
<SEQUENCE>5
<FILENAME>dex1041.htm
<DESCRIPTION>AMENDMENT TO THE PEPSICO, INC. 1994 LONG-TERM INCENTIVE PLAN
<TEXT>
<HTML><HEAD>
<TITLE>Amendment to the PepsiCo, Inc. 1994 Long-Term Incentive Plan</TITLE>
</HEAD>
 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Exhibit 10.41 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Amendment to </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>the PepsiCo, Inc. 1994 Long-Term Incentive Plan, </B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>the PepsiCo, Inc. 1995 Stock Option Incentive Plan, </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>the PepsiCo SharePower Stock Option Plan and </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>the PepsiCo, Inc. 1987 Incentive Plan </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>(effective February&nbsp;2, 2007) </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="3">The following text shall replace in its entirety the current text (as previously amended effective December&nbsp;31, 2005) of Section&nbsp;8(a) of the PepsiCo, Inc. 1994 Long-Term Incentive Plan, Section&nbsp;11 of the PepsiCo, Inc. 1995
Stock Option Incentive Plan, Section&nbsp;6(h) of the PepsiCo SharePower Stock Option Plan and the first paragraph of Section&nbsp;8 of the PepsiCo, Inc. 1987 Incentive Plan: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"
ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">Effective on the date of such Change in Control, all outstanding and unvested Options granted under the Plan shall immediately vest and become exercisable, and all Options then outstanding under
the Plan shall remain outstanding in accordance with their terms. Notwithstanding anything to the contrary in this Plan, in the event that any Option granted under the Plan becomes unexercisable during its term on or after a Change in Control
because: (i)&nbsp;the individual who holds such Option is involuntarily terminated (other than for cause) within two (2)&nbsp;years after the Change in Control; (ii)&nbsp;such Option is terminated or adversely modified; or (iii)&nbsp;Common Stock is
no longer issued and outstanding, or no longer traded on a national securities exchange, then the holder of such Option shall immediately be entitled to receive a lump sum cash payment equal to (A)&nbsp;the gain on such Option or (B)&nbsp;only if
greater than the gain and only with respect to NQSOs the Black-Scholes value of such Option (as determined by a nationally recognized independent investment banker chosen by PepsiCo), in either case calculated on the date such Option becomes
unexercisable. For purposes of the preceding sentence, the gain on an Option shall be calculated as the difference between the closing price per share of Common Stock as of the date such Option becomes unexercisable less the Option Exercise Price.
</FONT></P>
</BODY></HTML>
</TEXT>
</DOCUMENT>
<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-12
<SEQUENCE>6
<FILENAME>dex12.htm
<DESCRIPTION>COMPUTATION OF RATIO OF EARNINGS TO FIXED CHARGES.
<TEXT>
<HTML><HEAD>
<TITLE>Computation of Ratio of Earnings to Fixed Charges.</TITLE>
</HEAD>

<TYPE>EX-23
<SEQUENCE>8
<FILENAME>dex23.htm
<DESCRIPTION>CONSENT OF KPMG LLP.
<TEXT>
<HTML><HEAD>
<TITLE>CONSENT OF KPMG LLP.</TITLE>
</HEAD>
 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>EXHIBIT 23 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Consent of Independent Registered Public Accounting Firm </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">Board of Directors and Shareholders
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">PepsiCo, Inc.: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">We consent to
incorporation by reference in the Registration Statements listed below of PepsiCo, Inc. of our report dated February&nbsp;16, 2007, relating to the consolidated balance sheet of PepsiCo, Inc. and Subsidiaries as of December&nbsp;30, 2006 and
December&nbsp;31, 2005 and the related consolidated statements of income, cash flows and common shareholders&#146; equity for each of the years in the three-year period ended December&nbsp;30, 2006, and management&#146;s assessment of the
effectiveness of internal control over financial reporting as of December&nbsp;30, 2006 and the effectiveness of internal control over financial reporting as of December&nbsp;30, 2006, which report appears in the December&nbsp;30, 2006 annual report
on Form 10-K of PepsiCo, Inc. Our report refers to a change in the method of accounting for defined benefit pension and other postretirement plans. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="3"><B>Description, Registration Statement Number </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><U>Form S-3 </U> </FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="justify"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">&#150;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">PepsiCo SharePower Stock Option Plan for PCDC Employees, 33-42121 </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="justify"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">&#150;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">$32,500,000 Puerto Rico Industrial, Medical and Environmental Pollution Control Facilities Financing Authority Adjustable Rate Industrial Revenue Bonds, 33-53232
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="justify"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">&#150;</FONT></P></TD>

<DESCRIPTION>POWER OF ATTORNEY

<HTML><HEAD>
<TITLE>Power of Attorney</TITLE>
</HEAD>
 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Exhibit 24 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>POWER OF ATTORNEY </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">PepsiCo, Inc. (&#147;PepsiCo&#148;) and each of the undersigned, an officer or
director, or both, of PepsiCo, do hereby appoint Larry D. Thompson and Thomas H. Tamoney, Jr., and each of them severally, its, his or her true and lawful attorney-in-fact to execute on behalf of PepsiCo and the undersigned the following documents
and any and all amendments thereto (including post-effective amendments): </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="justify"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">(i)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">Automatic Shelf Registration Statement No.&nbsp;333-133735 relating to the offer and sale of PepsiCo Common Stock, Debt Securities, Warrants and Units;
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD WIDTH="5%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">Registration Statements No.&nbsp;33-53232, 33-64243 and 333-102035 relating to the offer and sale of PepsiCo&#146;s Debt Securities, Warrants and Guarantees;
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

primary and/or secondary offer and sale of PepsiCo Common Stock issued or exchanged in connection with acquisition transactions; </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

and sale of PepsiCo Common Stock under PepsiCo&#146;s 1979 Incentive Plan and 1972 Performance Share Plan, as amended; Registration Statement No.&nbsp;333-66632 relating to the offer and sale of PepsiCo Common Stock under The Quaker Long Term

</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">Schedule 13G relating to PepsiCo&#146;s beneficial ownership of Common Stock and Class B Common Stock of The Pepsi Bottling Group, Schedule 13D relating to
PepsiCo&#146;s beneficial ownership of Common Stock of PepsiAmericas, Inc., any amendments to such schedule 13D or Schedule 13G and any schedules to such 13D, 13G or any amendment thereto deemed to be necessary or appropriate by any such
attorney-in-fact; </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">all other applications, reports, registrations, information, documents and instruments filed or required to be filed by PepsiCo with the Securities and Exchange
Commission, any stock exchanges or any governmental official or agency in connection with the listing, registration or approval of PepsiCo Common Stock, PepsiCo debt securities or warrants, other securities or PepsiCo guarantees of its
subsidiaries&#146; debt securities or warrants, or the offer and sale thereof, or in order to meet PepsiCo&#146;s reporting requirements to such entities or persons; </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"
ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">and to file the same, with all exhibits thereto and other documents in connection therewith, and each of such attorneys shall have the power to act hereunder with or without the other.
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the undersigned has executed this instrument on February&nbsp;20, 2007. </FONT></P> <P

<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top" COLSPAN="3"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">PepsiCo, Inc.</FONT></P></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-31
<SEQUENCE>10
<FILENAME>dex31.htm
<DESCRIPTION>CERTIFICATION OF OUR CEO AND OUR CFO  PURSUANT TO SECTION 302
<TEXT>
<HTML><HEAD>
<TITLE>Certification of our CEO and our CFO  pursuant to Section 302</TITLE>
</HEAD>
 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>EXHIBIT 31 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>CERTIFICATION </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">I, <B>Indra K. Nooyi,</B> certify that: </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="justify"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">1.</FONT></P></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">I have reviewed this annual report on Form 10-K of PepsiCo, Inc. (PepsiCo); </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="justify"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">2.</FONT></P></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements
made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report; </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="justify"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">3.</FONT></P></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial
condition, results of operations and cash flows of PepsiCo as of, and for, the periods presented in this report; </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="justify"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">4.</FONT></P></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">PepsiCo&#146;s other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act
Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for PepsiCo and have: </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="justify"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">a)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material
information relating to PepsiCo, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared; </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="justify"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">b)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">Designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to
provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles; </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="justify"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">c)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">Evaluated the effectiveness of PepsiCo&#146;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the
disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="justify"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">d)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">Disclosed in this report any change in PepsiCo&#146;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during PepsiCo&#146;s fourth fiscal quarter that
has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, PepsiCo&#146;s internal control over financial reporting; and </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="justify"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">5.</FONT></P></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">PepsiCo&#146;s other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to PepsiCo&#146;s
auditors and the audit committee of PepsiCo&#146;s board of directors: </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="justify"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">a)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to
adversely affect PepsiCo&#146;s ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in PepsiCo&#146;s internal control over financial
reporting. </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>CERTIFICATION </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">I, <B>Richard Goodman, </B>certify that: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="justify"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">2.</FONT></P></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements
made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report; </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="justify"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3">3.</FONT></P></TD>

condition, results of operations and cash flows of PepsiCo as of, and for, the periods presented in this report; </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
